entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
